sentence: Another candidate in the primary is Doug Mastriano, a state senator whos been subpoenaed by the January 6th committee over his possible role in working to change the results of the 2020 presidential election.
author: Teny Sahakian
title: Pennsylvania gubernatorial candidate gets private sit-down with Trump at CPAC; will seek endorsement

sentence: The governors race poll has Doug Mastriano with a ten-point lead, 27.6 percent to Lou Barlettas 17.6 percent, with Dave White at 15.1 percent, William McSwain at 14.4 percent, 11.3 percent undecided, and four candidates in single digits.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: Pennsylvanias Senate Enigma

sentence: | Matt Rourke/AP Photo By Zach Montellaro, Meridith McGraw and Holly Otterbein 05/14/2022 09:57 AM EDT Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano on Saturday landed the coveted endorsement of former President Donald Trump with days to go before the gubernatorial primary.
title: Trump endorses Mastriano for Pennsylvania governor
